cells.e3f98769-f1cc-480d-b63d-b6db4f62bc40: The bread-and-butter enemy. High base weight ensures they're always in the mix. Wide spread and moderate peak level make them a constant background threat that teaches core mechanics.
Forces players to handle speed. High difficulty rating (5.0) means waves with FAST enemies have fewer total spawns but demand quick reactions. Peaks mid-game alongside BASIC for a difficulty spike.
Very wide spread (51) and low base weight means they show up occasionally across many levels. Low difficulty (1.5) allows many per wave. Tests whether the player has invested in AOE damage.
High peak level (70) means they're a late-game enemy. Moderate difficulty and falloff. Forces sustained DPS. Acts as a gatekeeper that punishes under-leveled builds.
Tight spread (18) concentrates spawns in a narrow level band. Moderate difficulty (3.0). Designed to break predictable patterns and force defensive play during its active window.

Low peak level (16) and narrow spread (8) make this an early-game threat that fades quickly. High base weight (0.8) ensures it shows up reliably during its window. Teaches players that tougher enemies exist.
